topics.body:
"An update on the current flash situation curtosy of Kirbyfanneox.":http://kirbyfanneox.tumblr.com/post/123551828888/warning-disable-adobe-flash-asap If you are using any of the following, you could be at risk:
    Adobe Flash Player 18.0.0.194 and earlier versions for Windows and Macintosh
    Adobe Flash Player Extended Support Release version 13.0.0.296 and earlier 13.x versions for Windows and Macintosh
    Adobe Flash Player 11.2.202.468 and earlier 11.x versions for Linux

Chrom users should be fine as version 18.0.0.203 seems to have been sent out, Firefox users may have to manually update their version.
